name: Estray
description:
During her last day in the orphanage, the main character Kena is being injected with a drug to turn her into a mindless laborer and welcome her into the society of the city of Eden. When she is thrown out to the streets after the „ceremony“, a stray dog named Ray frees her from the drug and adopts her as his new human. As a team, they solve riddles and escape evil agents to unravel the mysteries of this drug.

Join the adventure with your friends and experience the world through either Kena or Ray's eyes - work together as a team like the two strays, otherwise you will stand no chance against the evil agents and never solve the riddles at hand.

Estray is a local-coop platformer with animated sequences, created by 8 students of the University of Applied Sciences Salzburg as their graduation project. We are currently working on final refinements to the game, afterwards its final version will be released on both Itch.io and Steam for Windows and Mac (not available on Itch.io yet).
